We Are Looking for:

A senior QA Automation Engineer/Lead to join our company for a new Adobe AEM development project team.


Our Partner:

A leading Adobe Solution Partner based in Munich.

Our partner is an integrated marketing and technology services company that develops highly personalized web experiences in order to:
• Help their end-customers make the business grow faster
• Build B2B/B2E platforms to improve the collaboration with business partners or employees using the Adobe Marketing Cloud


The Platform:


The Adobe Experience Manager (formerly known as CQ5) is a 100% Java-based, platform-independent content management software solution.

AEM is currently the worldwide market leader in the field of web experience management.

At present, more than 3,000 companies are using AEM – and the trend continues rapidly upward.

AEM is a combination of the industry’s leading WCM platform Adobe CQ, Digital Asset Management (DAM), Social Communities (SoCo) and AEM Forms. This platform is designed to help you create a specifically tailored customer experience across channels.

AEM’s performance relies especially on its unique architecture, the core of which consists of the Content Bus, which is used to create a virtual repository. The Content Bus allows content from all back-end systems to be standardized and also provides standardized management and access.


Responsibilities:

• Start an automation process for the project from scratch
• Evaluate tools and define an automation strategy for the QA team together with the QA Manager
• Implement a robust QA automation framework
• Create and mentor an automation team
• Work together with the manual testing team to assure successful releases


Required Competencies:

• Experience in software testing web applications
• Basic understanding of software architectures and concepts
• Technical background (databases, client-server architecture, programming skills)
• Knowledge of QA concepts and process
• Experience in QA Automation
• Adobe AEM / WEM foundation concepts (Plus)
• Proficiency in English


We Value:

• Respect
• Reliability
• Strive for excellence



Notes:

• Only candidates selected after the CV screening phase will be contacted.
• The position is in Cluj-Napoca, but we also recruit non-Cluj residents willing to relocate.

 Fortech’s Offer

 At Fortech we enhance the value of each individual, encourage personal evolution and create an appropriate environment, in order to facilitate know-how transfer and to assure access to the cutting-edge technology.

 Working @ Fortech

 # Yearly training plan ~ designed to suit individual needs, comprising both hard and soft skills development and improvement
 # Career growth opportunities ~ working on international projects with global teams and working on-site at clients’ headquarters in Western Europe and the USA
 Varying professional activities ~ job rotation, coaching and mentoring activities
 Company-sponsored technical certification program ~ Microsoft, Oracle, Sitecore, ISTQB
 # Supportive working environment ~ separate office rooms for up to 10-12 people
 # Company-sponsored events ~ parties, team-buildings and sporting activities and competitions (football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, ping-pong, marathons, biking)
 # Premium subscription to medical services at a private health center
 # Motivating recognition and rewarding salary package (our company policy is to exclude PFA contracts)
